content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, 24.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -4.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)

### Laboratory at position(5.5, -12.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 5.5, -12.5)
  
### Laboratory at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 2.5, 1.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to get entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access is present at the specified position. Double-check the coordinates and ensure the entity type matches.

### Errors related to entity connection status
- Verify that all components of your electricity generator (boiler and steam engine) are properly connected to each other and to a power source to avoid 'NOT_CONNECTED' status.

### Errors with laboratory power supply
- Make sure that your labs are connected to a power source to avoid 'NO_POWER' status. Check the connections and ensure that there is sufficient power supply available.
